comments.content:
The tileserver url of opencyclemap has changed:
The old URLs in TileSourceFactory.java

  http://[a|b|c.]andy.sandbox.cloudmade.com/tiles/cycle/

needs to be updated to

  http://[a|b|c.]tile.opencyclemap.org/cycle/

Source:
http://www.gravitystorm.co.uk/shine/change-of-tileserver-url/
This issue was closed by revision r1032.
